svg.text: Professional Movie Production Pipeline - What's Missing for Feature Films
üö® THE GAP: Why We Can't Make Movies Yet
üåü OpenAI Sora (60 sec) - NOT AVAILABLE YET
‚≠ê Runway Gen-3 Alpha Turbo (10 sec extend)
REALITY: No AI model makes 60+ sec video yet!
No way to maintain actor identity
SOLUTION: Train LoRA for each character
+ Use IP-Adapter to inject face into every frame
Need lip sync with generated video
üîß HOW TO MAKE LONG-FORM VIDEO (The Assembly Strategy)
THE ONLY WAY TO MAKE 10 MIN - 3 HOUR MOVIES:
1Ô∏è‚É£ SCRIPT ‚Üí Break movie into 100-500 individual scenes
2Ô∏è‚É£ STORYBOARD ‚Üí Generate image for each scene
3Ô∏è‚É£ ANIMATE ‚Üí Convert each image to 4-10 sec video clip
4Ô∏è‚É£ DIALOGUE ‚Üí Generate character voices for each clip
5Ô∏è‚É£ LIP SYNC ‚Üí Apply lip sync to talking scenes
6Ô∏è‚É£ ASSEMBLE ‚Üí Stitch all clips with transitions
7Ô∏è‚É£ MIX ‚Üí Add music, SFX, dialogue tracks
2. Each speaker gets unique TTS voice
4. Mix with music intro/outro ‚Üí 15-60 min episodes
6 sec @ 720p | 24GB VRAM | Docker: docker pull cogvideox
25 frames | 12GB VRAM | Integrate with existing ComfyUI
60 sec native | TBD pricing | NOT YET AVAILABLE
üöÄ ACTION PLAN - Making Professional Movies Possible
‚ñ° Set up IP-Adapter FaceID in ComfyUI
‚ñ° Install XTTS v2 for local TTS
‚Ä¢ Short films (10 min): 1x RTX 3090 = 6-10 hours render
‚Ä¢ Features (90 min): Add Tesla P40 = 3-5 days render
‚Ä¢ Or use cloud APIs to accelerate
AI video is still 4-10 seconds per clip.
The SECRET to long-form content is:
INTELLIGENT ASSEMBLY of many short clips
Nano Banana Studio Pro ¬© 2024 | From 4-second clips to 3-hour movies through intelligent assembly
